note.p: Cook. Daughter of Sarah Ann and John Tipping (or Tippin), labourer, of Cudham, Kent. Employed by Frederick and Frances Allen of Down Lodge, Down, 1871. Married Alfred Richards (1844/5–1929), fruit grower of Down, in 1873. Living in Cudham, 1911.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1606/304/10), 1871 (RG10/875/35/4) (Sarah Ann Tiffin), 1911 (RG14/3690/97)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 9 December 2019)
